biotools.summary: BreastDeformNet is a deep learning tool for predicting non-rigid breast deformations between preoperative and intraoperative configurations. It uses volumetric distance-field representations derived from MRI and surface data to estimate patient-specific displacement vector fields (DVFs). The model enables fast, anatomically consistent deformation estimation to support image-guided breast surgery planning.
